seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and role involves leading data infrastructure development and mentoring team members

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on building data pipelines, infrastructure, and working with analytics teams

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary focus on data pipelines using Airflow for scheduled jobs, e-commerce data transformation, and batch processing patterns

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions driving data infrastructure forward, liaising with stakeholders, and working closely with analytics team, but no direct reports mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS explicitly mentioned multiple times with specific services: Redshift, S3, EC2, Lambda, SageMaker

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only AWS mentioned as cloud platform, GCP mentioned as nice-to-have but not used

processing_paradigm.evidence: Airflow mentioned for pipeline orchestration suggests batch processing, no real-time streaming technologies mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow explicitly mentioned as primary orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: Redshift mentioned as primary data warehouse, S3 mentioned but appears to be for raw data feeding into warehouse

remote_restriction.evidence: Based in Stockholm with 300 team members mainly in Sweden, suggesting local/onsite preference but not explicitly stated

timezone_focus.evidence: Headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden, serving Nordic/European markets suggests CET/CEST timezone alignment

relocation_required.evidence: Position based in Stockholm with team mainly in Sweden, suggesting relocation to Stockholm area would be expected

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, and being a Swedish company with local team focus suggests limited visa sponsorship

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, and senior role requirements suggest work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, but EU work authorization likely required for Stockholm-based position

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employee position with comprehensive benefits package suggests W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: Multiple premium benefits: ITP1 pension, private healthcare, 30 days vacation, parental pay lift, wellness allowance, social events

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'Learn, grow, be challenged' and 'will to learn and develop' but no specific career tracks mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: Team collaboration emphasized and working with tech team to drive infrastructure forward suggests mentorship opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit promotion or advancement path mentioned in the job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: Senior IC role mentioned but no management track or other career paths explicitly discussed

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-haves (SQL, Python, AWS experience) and nice-to-haves (GCP, e-commerce), balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific responsibilities, technologies, and clear focus on data infrastructure

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements are appropriate for senior level: SQL/Python, AWS, data engineering experience, with reasonable nice-to-haves
